name: Guayacan - Rojas Reserve Connecticut - Toro
additionalNotes:
Guayacan Cigars is the little engine that could. Owner Noel Rojas has an amazing story about his journey in the cigar industry, but I won't spoil it, and I will let you ask him in person when you see him. Guayacan are all made in Noels factory in Nicaragua with some of the best tobaccos out there today.
